physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Blood clot in the anterior chamber; brown-colored tissue beneath the conjunctiva; complete iris loss on postoperative examination; intact intracapsular-fixed lens position.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, IOP was 13 mmHg OD and 38 mmHg OS; at final visit (4 months postoperatively), IOP changed to 16 mmHg OD and 13 mmHg OS. BCVA improved from hand motions OS to 1.2 bilaterally.
